summary: Evacuate quickly, stay low to avoid smoke, and call emergency services.
steps: If there is smoke, stay low and exit immediately using stairs.
Feel doors with the back of your hand before opening; if hot, use another exit.
Assemble at your predetermined outdoor meeting point and call for help.
sms_template: Fire at {location}. Evacuate immediately and call emergency services. Reply YES/NO.
warnings: Close doors behind you to slow spread of fire.
